extName.description: Extension name shown in Chrome Web Store and browser toolbar. Max 45 chars.

extDescription.message: Ver, editar, crear y eliminar cookies. Exportar/importar perfiles, reglas de eliminación automática y decodificar JWT.
extDescription.description: Extension description for Chrome Web Store listing. Max 132 chars.

extActionTitle.description: Tooltip shown when hovering over the extension icon in the browser toolbar.

brandTitle.description: Brand title shown in the popup header next to the Zovo logo.

ttlCookies.description: Tab label for the Cookies tab in the popup navigation bar.

ttlProfiles.description: Tab label for the Profiles tab in the popup navigation bar.

ttlRules.description: Tab label for the Rules tab in the popup navigation bar.

ttlHealth.description: Tab label for the Health tab in the popup navigation bar.

ttlEditCookie.description: Modal title when editing an existing cookie.

ttlAddCookie.description: Modal title when creating a new cookie.

ttlJwtToken.description: Modal title for the JWT decoder viewer.

ttlSaveCookieProfile.description: Dialog title when saving current cookies as a profile.

ttlAddRule.description: Form title when creating a new auto-delete rule.

ttlEditRule.description: Form title when editing an existing auto-delete rule.

ttlCookieHealth.description: Label shown inside the health score circle on the Health tab.

ttlTrackingCookiesDetected.description: Section heading on the Health tab when trackers are found.

ttlRecommendations.description: Section heading for health recommendations on the Health tab.

btnExport.description: Button label to export cookies as JSON file. Shown in the action bar.

btnImport.description: Button label to import cookies from a JSON file. Shown in the action bar.

btnAdd.description: Button label to add/create a new cookie. Shown in the action bar.

btnClear.description: Button label to clear all cookies for the current domain. Shown in the action bar.

btnSave.description: Generic save button label used in dialogs.

btnSaveCookie.description: Button label in the cookie editor modal footer to save the cookie.

btnSaveRule.description: Button label in the rule form to save the auto-delete rule.

btnDelete.description: Button label to delete a cookie. Shown in the editor modal footer.

btnCancel.description: Button label to cancel and close a dialog or form.

btnConfirm.description: Button label to confirm a destructive action in the confirm dialog.

btnClose.description: Tooltip and aria-label for close buttons on modals.

btnRefresh.description: Tooltip and aria-label for the refresh button in the popup header.

btnSaveCurrentCookies.description: Button label on the Profiles tab to save the current domain cookies as a profile.

btnAddRule.description: Button label on the Rules tab to create a new auto-delete rule.

btnLoad.description: Button label on a profile card to restore cookies from that profile.

btnEdit.description: Button label on a rule card to edit the auto-delete rule.

btnCleanTrackers.description: Button on the Health tab to delete all detected tracking cookies.

btnDecodeJwt.description: Link button shown next to a JWT-detected cookie value to open the JWT decoder.

btnCopy.description: Tooltip and aria-label for copy-to-clipboard buttons in the JWT viewer.

btnLeaveReview.description: Button label in the growth banner prompting user to leave a Chrome Web Store review.

btnShare.description: Button label in the growth banner prompting user to share the extension.

btnLater.description: Dismiss button label for growth banners and retention prompts.

btnUpgradeNow.description: Link text in the trial banner prompting user to upgrade before trial ends.

lblName.description: Form label for the cookie name field in the editor modal.

lblValue.description: Form label for the cookie value field in the editor modal.

lblDomain.description: Form label for the cookie domain field in the editor modal.

lblPath.description: Form label for the cookie path field in the editor modal.

lblExpiration.description: Form label for the cookie expiration date field in the editor modal.

lblSecure.description: Checkbox label for the Secure flag in the cookie editor.

lblHttpOnly.description: Checkbox label for the HttpOnly flag in the cookie editor.

lblSameSite.description: Form label for the SameSite dropdown in the cookie editor.

lblProfileName.description: Form label for the profile name input when saving a cookie profile.

lblDomainPattern.description: Form label for the domain pattern input in the auto-delete rule form.

lblCookieNamePattern.description: Form label for the cookie name pattern input in the auto-delete rule form.

lblSchedule.description: Form label for the schedule dropdown in the auto-delete rule form.

lblReadOnlyMode.description: Title and aria-label for the read-only toggle switch in the action bar.

lblHelp.description: Footer link label for the help/FAQ page.

lblPrivacy.description: Footer link label for the privacy policy page.

lblManageSubscription.description: Footer link shown to paid users to manage their subscription.

plhSearchCookies.description: Placeholder text for the cookie search input field in the popup.

plhCookieName.description: Placeholder text for the cookie name input in the editor modal.

plhCookieValue.description: Placeholder text for the cookie value textarea in the editor modal.

plhDomain.description: Placeholder text for the domain input in the cookie editor modal.

plhPath.description: Placeholder text for the path input in the cookie editor modal.

plhProfileName.description: Placeholder text for the profile name input when saving a profile.

plhRuleDomain.description: Placeholder text for the domain pattern input in the rule form.

plhRuleCookiePattern.description: Placeholder text for the cookie name pattern input in the rule form.

plhLicenseKey.description: Placeholder text for the license key input in the paywall modal.

tipSessionCookie.message: Deja vacío para cookie de sesión
tipSessionCookie.description: Hint text below the expiration date field in the cookie editor.

tipRestoreProfile.description: Tooltip for the Load button on a profile card.

tipDeleteProfile.description: Tooltip for the delete icon button on a profile card.

tipDisableRule.description: Tooltip for the toggle switch on a rule card when the rule is enabled.

tipEnableRule.description: Tooltip for the toggle switch on a rule card when the rule is disabled.

tipHelpFaq.description: Tooltip for the Help link in the footer.

tipPrivacyPolicy.description: Tooltip for the Privacy link in the footer.

msgDomainLoading.description: Placeholder text shown for the domain name while the popup initializes.

msgChromePage.description: Domain display text when the active tab is a chrome:// internal page.

msgLoadingCookies.description: Loading state message shown while cookies are being fetched.

msgAnalyzingCookies.description: Summary text shown on the Health tab while analysis is in progress.

msgNoCookiesFound.description: Empty state title when no cookies exist for the current domain.

msgNoCookiesSet.message: Este sitio no tiene cookies configuradas
msgNoCookiesSet.description: Empty state subtitle when no cookies exist for the current domain.

msgNoSearchResults.message: Ninguna cookie coincide con tu búsqueda
msgNoSearchResults.description: Empty state subtitle when a search returns zero results.

msgNoCookiesToAnalyze.description: Empty state title on the Health tab when there are no cookies.

msgVisitWebsite.message: Visita un sitio web para ver su puntuación de salud de cookies
msgVisitWebsite.description: Empty state subtitle on the Health tab when there are no cookies.

msgNoSavedProfiles.description: Empty state title on the Profiles tab when no profiles exist.

msgSaveProfileHint.message: Guarda tus cookies actuales como perfil para restaurarlas rápidamente después
msgSaveProfileHint.description: Empty state subtitle on the Profiles tab when no profiles exist.

msgNoRulesYet.description: Empty state title on the Rules tab when no auto-delete rules exist.

msgCreateRuleHint.message: Crea una regla para eliminar cookies automáticamente según un horario
msgCreateRuleHint.description: Empty state subtitle on the Rules tab when no rules exist.

msgJwtDetected.description: Badge text shown on the cookie value field when a JWT token is detected.

msgJwtHeader.description: Section heading for the JWT header section in the JWT decoder modal.

msgJwtPayload.description: Section heading for the JWT payload section in the JWT decoder modal.

msgAllCookies.description: Badge text on a rule card when the cookie name pattern is set to wildcard (*).

msgAllClearHealthy.message: Todo bien. Tus cookies se ven saludables.
msgAllClearHealthy.description: Message shown in the recommendations section when no issues are found.

msgWelcomeBack.message: Bienvenido de vuelta. Descubre lo que Cookie Manager puede hacer.
msgWelcomeBack.description: Default retention banner message shown to returning users.

msgReviewPrompt.message: ¿Te gusta Cookie Manager? Una reseña rápida ayuda a otros desarrolladores a encontrarnos.
msgReviewPrompt.description: Growth banner text prompting the user to leave a review on the Chrome Web Store.

msgThisPageNoCookies.description: Empty state message for chrome:// pages or pages with no cookies.

msgFooterBuiltBy.description: Footer text before the brand name 'zovo.' attribution.

msgFooterBrand.description: Brand name shown in the footer attribution. Do not translate.

msgEmptyValue.description: Display text when a cookie value is empty string.

stsFree.description: Subscription badge text for free-tier users.

stsPro.description: Subscription badge text for Pro subscribers.

stsTrial.description: Subscription badge text for users on a free trial.

stsLifetime.description: Subscription badge text for users with a lifetime license.

stsProLabel.description: Small label appended to locked features indicating they require a Pro subscription.

stsSecure.description: Badge label for cookies with the Secure flag set.

stsHttpOnly.description: Badge label for cookies with the HttpOnly flag set.

stsJwt.description: Badge label for cookies detected as JWT tokens.

stsSession.description: Badge label for session cookies (no expiration date).

ntfCookieCreated.description: Toast notification shown after successfully creating a new cookie.

ntfCookieSaved.description: Toast notification shown after successfully saving/updating a cookie.

ntfCookieDeleted.description: Toast notification shown after successfully deleting a cookie.

ntfCookiesRefreshed.description: Toast notification shown after refreshing the cookie list.

ntfCookiesExportedClipboard.message: $COUNT$ cookies exportadas y copiadas al portapapeles
ntfCookiesExportedClipboard.description: Toast notification after exporting cookies with clipboard copy.

ntfCookiesExportedFile.description: Toast notification after exporting cookies as file (clipboard unavailable).

ntfImportedCookies.description: Toast notification after importing cookies successfully.

ntfImportedCookiesWithFailures.description: Toast notification after importing cookies when some failed.

ntfClearedCookies.description: Toast notification after clearing all cookies for a domain.

ntfReadOnlyEnabled.description: Toast notification when the read-only toggle is turned on.

ntfReadOnlyDisabled.description: Toast notification when the read-only toggle is turned off.

ntfCopiedToClipboard.description: Toast notification after successfully copying text to clipboard.

ntfDebugBundleExported.description: Toast notification after exporting a debug bundle file.

ntfProfileSaved.description: Toast notification after successfully saving a cookie profile.

ntfProfileRestored.description: Toast notification after loading a cookie profile.

ntfProfileRestoredWithFailures.description: Toast notification after loading a profile with some failures.

ntfProfileDeleted.description: Toast notification after deleting a cookie profile.

ntfRuleCreated.description: Toast notification after creating a new auto-delete rule.

ntfRuleUpdated.description: Toast notification after updating an existing auto-delete rule.

ntfRuleDeleted.description: Toast notification after deleting an auto-delete rule.

ntfFeedbackSubmitted.description: Toast notification after successfully submitting user feedback.

ntfTrackersRemoved.description: Toast notification after cleaning tracking cookies from the Health tab.

ntfCookiesSecured.description: Toast notification after setting the Secure flag on insecure cookies.

ntfCookiesCleared.description: System notification title shown after clearing cookies via context menu.

ntfCookiesClearedMsg.description: System notification body after clearing cookies via context menu.

ntfReadOnlyNotification.message: El modo de solo lectura está activado. Desactívalo para limpiar las cookies.
ntfReadOnlyNotification.description: System notification body when user tries to clear via context menu but read-only is on.

ntfCookiesExportedTitle.description: System notification title shown after exporting cookies via context menu.

ntfCookiesExportedContextMsg.message: $COUNT$ cookies de $DOMAIN$ copiadas. Abre el popup para descargar.
ntfCookiesExportedContextMsg.description: System notification body after exporting cookies via context menu.

errReadOnlyMode.message: El modo de solo lectura está activado
errReadOnlyMode.description: Error message when attempting a write operation while read-only mode is active.

errCookieNameRequired.message: El nombre de la cookie es obligatorio
errCookieNameRequired.description: Validation error when the cookie name field is empty.

errDomainRequired.description: Validation error when the cookie domain field is empty.

errDomainPatternRequired.message: El patrón de dominio es obligatorio
errDomainPatternRequired.description: Validation error when the rule domain pattern field is empty.

errNoCookiesToExport.description: Error when attempting to export but there are no cookies.

errNoCookiesToClear.description: Error when attempting to clear all cookies but none exist.

errFailedSaveCookie.description: Error message when a cookie save operation fails.

errFailedDeleteCookie.description: Error message when a cookie delete operation fails.

errFailedExportCookies.description: Error message when exporting cookies fails.

errFailedClearCookies.description: Error message when clearing domain cookies fails.

errFailedCopy.description: Error message when clipboard copy operation fails.

errInvalidJwt.description: Error message when the cookie value cannot be decoded as a valid JWT.

errImportFileTooLarge.message: Archivo de importación demasiado grande (máx. 1 MB)
errImportFileTooLarge.description: Error when the imported JSON file exceeds the 1 MB size limit.

errImportInvalidFormat.message: Formato no válido: se esperaba un arreglo JSON de cookies
errImportInvalidFormat.description: Error when the imported file does not contain a valid JSON array.

errImportTooManyCookies.message: Demasiadas cookies en el archivo de importación (máx. 500)
errImportTooManyCookies.description: Error when the imported file contains more than 500 cookies.

errFailedParseJson.message: Error al analizar el archivo JSON
errFailedParseJson.description: Error when the imported file is not valid JSON.

errFailedSaveSetting.description: Error when saving a user setting (e.g., read-only toggle) fails.

errLoadingCookies.description: Error message displayed in the empty state when cookie loading fails.

errNoDomainAvailable.message: No hay dominio disponible para guardar cookies
errNoDomainAvailable.description: Error when attempting to save a profile but no domain is detected.

errFailedSaveProfile.description: Error when saving a cookie profile fails.

errFailedLoadProfile.description: Error when loading/restoring a cookie profile fails.

errFailedDeleteProfile.description: Error when deleting a cookie profile fails.

errFailedSaveRule.description: Error when saving an auto-delete rule fails.

errFailedDeleteRule.description: Error when deleting an auto-delete rule fails.

errFailedSubmitFeedback.description: Error when the feedback submission fails.

errDomainProtected.description: Error when attempting to modify cookies on a protected domain.

errFreePlanRuleLimit.message: El plan gratuito permite 1 regla. Actualiza para más.
errFreePlanRuleLimit.description: Error when a free-tier user tries to create more than 1 auto-delete rule.

errProfileNameRequired.message: El nombre del perfil es obligatorio
errProfileNameRequired.description: Error from the background when saving a profile without a name.

errNoCookiesToSave.message: No hay cookies para guardar en el perfil
errNoCookiesToSave.description: Error from the background when there are no cookies to save in a profile.

errProfileNotFound.description: Error when trying to load or delete a profile that does not exist.

errLicenseKeyRequired.message: Por favor ingresa una clave de licencia.
errLicenseKeyRequired.description: Validation error in the paywall when the license key field is empty.

errLicenseConnectionFailed.message: Error de conexión. Por favor intenta de nuevo.
errLicenseConnectionFailed.description: Error in the paywall when the license activation request fails.

errInvalidLicenseKey.message: Clave de licencia no válida. Verifica e intenta de nuevo.
errInvalidLicenseKey.description: Error in the paywall when the entered license key is not valid.

errRuntimeNotAvailable.message: El entorno de ejecución de la extensión no está disponible.
errRuntimeNotAvailable.description: Error in the paywall when chrome.runtime is not accessible.

dlgDeleteCookie.description: Confirm dialog title when deleting a single cookie.

dlgDeleteCookieMsg.description: Confirm dialog message when deleting a single cookie.

dlgClearAllCookies.description: Confirm dialog title when clearing all cookies for a domain.

dlgClearAllCookiesMsg.message: Esto eliminará todas las $COUNT$ cookies de este dominio.
dlgClearAllCookiesMsg.description: Confirm dialog message when clearing all cookies.

dlgOverwriteProfile.description: Confirm dialog title when saving a profile with a name that already exists.

dlgOverwriteProfileMsg.description: Confirm dialog message when overwriting an existing profile.

dlgLoadProfile.description: Confirm dialog title when loading/restoring a cookie profile.

dlgLoadProfileMsg.message: Esto restaurará todas las cookies de "$NAME$" en el dominio actual. Las cookies existentes no se eliminarán primero.
dlgLoadProfileMsg.description: Confirm dialog message when loading a profile.

dlgDeleteProfile.description: Confirm dialog title when deleting a saved cookie profile.

dlgDeleteProfileMsg.message: ¿Estás seguro de que quieres eliminar "$NAME$"? Esto no se puede deshacer.
dlgDeleteProfileMsg.description: Confirm dialog message when deleting a profile.

dlgDeleteRule.description: Confirm dialog title when deleting an auto-delete rule.

dlgDeleteRuleMsg.message: ¿Eliminar la regla de eliminación automática para "$DOMAIN$"?
dlgDeleteRuleMsg.description: Confirm dialog message when deleting a rule.

dlgCleanTrackers.description: Confirm dialog title when cleaning tracking cookies on the Health tab.

dlgCleanTrackersMsg.message: ¿Eliminar $COUNT$ cookies de rastreo? Esto no se puede deshacer.
dlgCleanTrackersMsg.description: Confirm dialog message when cleaning trackers.

dlgSecureAllCookies.description: Confirm dialog title when adding the Secure flag to all insecure cookies.

dlgSecureAllCookiesMsg.message: ¿Establecer la bandera Secure en $COUNT$ cookies? Algunas cookies pueden no funcionar en sitios solo HTTP.
dlgSecureAllCookiesMsg.description: Confirm dialog message when securing all cookies.

ctxClearSiteCookies.description: Context menu item to clear all cookies for the current site.

ctxExportSiteCookies.description: Context menu item to export cookies for the current site.

ctxOpenCookieManager.description: Context menu item to open the Cookie Manager popup.

ctxCookieManagerSettings.description: Context menu item to open the Cookie Manager settings/options page.

optScheduleEveryHour.description: Schedule option for auto-delete rules: run every hour.

optScheduleEvery6Hours.description: Schedule option for auto-delete rules: run every 6 hours.

optScheduleEveryDay.description: Schedule option for auto-delete rules: run every day.

optScheduleOnBrowserClose.description: Schedule option for auto-delete rules: run when the browser closes.

optSameSiteNone.description: SameSite dropdown option: None (no restriction) policy.

payUpgradeTitle.description: Paywall modal title. Shows which feature triggered the upgrade prompt.

payUpgradeSubtitle.message: Actualiza a Cookie Manager Pro para el kit completo de herramientas.
payUpgradeSubtitle.description: Paywall modal subtitle text below the title.

payFeatureHeader.description: Column header in the paywall feature comparison table.

payFreeHeader.description: Column header for the free tier in the paywall comparison table.

payProHeader.description: Column header for the Pro tier in the paywall comparison table.

payFeatureBasicCookies.description: Feature name in paywall comparison: basic cookie CRUD operations.

payFeatureCookieProfiles.description: Feature name in paywall comparison: saving/loading cookie sets.

payFeatureAutoDeleteRules.description: Feature name in paywall comparison: scheduled cookie deletion rules.

payFeatureAdvancedExport.description: Feature name in paywall comparison: Netscape, CSV export formats.

payFeatureHealthDashboard.description: Feature name in paywall comparison: cookie health scoring and analysis.

payFeatureJwtDecoder.description: Feature name in paywall comparison: decode and view JWT token cookies.

payFeatureBulkOps.description: Feature name in paywall comparison: bulk cookie operations.

payUnlimited.description: Feature limit text for Pro tier in paywall comparison table.

payMonthly.description: Pricing tier name for monthly subscription in the paywall.

payMonthlyPrice.description: Monthly subscription price displayed in the paywall.

payMonthlyNote.description: Note below the monthly price in the paywall.

payAnnual.description: Pricing tier name for annual subscription in the paywall.

payAnnualPrice.description: Annual subscription price displayed in the paywall.

payAnnualNote.description: Note below the annual price showing monthly equivalent.

payBestValue.description: Badge shown on the annual pricing tier to indicate best value.

paySavePercent.description: Savings badge shown on the annual pricing tier.

payCtaAnnual.description: Primary CTA button text for annual subscription in the paywall.

payCtaMonthly.description: Secondary CTA button text for monthly subscription in the paywall.

payTrustSecure.description: Trust signal text in the paywall footer.

payTrustMoneyBack.description: Trust signal text in the paywall footer.

payTrustCancelAnytime.description: Trust signal text in the paywall footer.

payLicenseToggle.description: Toggle button text to show the license key input form in the paywall.

payActivateLicense.description: Button text to submit the license key for activation.

payActivating.description: Button text shown while the license activation is in progress.

payUpgradeProUnlimited.message: Actualiza a Pro para perfiles ilimitados
payUpgradeProUnlimited.description: Lock overlay message on the Profiles tab when the free-tier profile limit is reached.

payRulesFreeLimitReached.message: Límite gratuito alcanzado (1 regla). Actualiza para ilimitadas.
payRulesFreeLimitReached.description: Lock overlay message on the Rules tab when the free-tier rule limit is reached.

payTrialBanner.description: Trial banner text shown at the top of the popup during an active trial.

msgCookieCount.description: Cookie count display on profile cards, e.g., '12 cookies'.

msgCookieCountSingular.description: Singular form of cookie count display on profile cards.

msgCookiesAffected.description: Count of cookies matching a rule, shown on rule cards.

msgCookieAffectedSingular.description: Singular form of affected cookie count on rule cards.

msgSavedDatePrefix.description: Prefix before relative time on profile cards, e.g., 'Saved 2 hours ago'.

msgJustNow.description: Relative time text for very recent actions (under 1 minute ago).

msgMinutesAgo.description: Relative time text for minutes, e.g., '5 min ago'.

msgHoursAgo.description: Relative time text for hours, e.g., '3 hours ago'.

msgHourAgo.description: Singular relative time text for exactly one hour ago.

msgDaysAgo.description: Relative time text for days, e.g., '5 days ago'.

msgDayAgo.description: Singular relative time text for exactly one day ago.

msgUnknownDate.description: Fallback text when a profile has no recorded date.

msgCookiesFoundCount.description: Screen reader announcement after a search, e.g., '5 cookies found'.

msgCookieFoundSingular.description: Singular screen reader announcement when search returns 1 result.

msgTabSelected.description: Screen reader announcement when switching tabs.

msgHealthSummary.description: Health tab summary line below the grade circle.

msgHealthSecureCookies.description: Health category label for the percentage of cookies with the Secure flag.

msgHealthHttpOnly.description: Health category label for the percentage of cookies with the HttpOnly flag.

msgHealthSameSiteSet.description: Health category label for the percentage of cookies with SameSite configured.

msgHealthTrackersFound.description: Health category label for the number of tracking cookies detected.

msgRecRemoveTrackers.description: Health recommendation title: remove tracking cookies.

msgRecRemoveTrackersDetail.message: Elimina $COUNT$ cookies de rastreo para mejorar tu puntuación de privacidad.
msgRecRemoveTrackersDetail.description: Health recommendation detail text for removing trackers.

msgRecAddSecureFlag.description: Health recommendation title: add Secure flag to insecure cookies.

msgRecAddSecureFlagDetail.message: $COUNT$ cookies carecen de la bandera Secure, haciéndolas vulnerables en conexiones HTTP.
msgRecAddSecureFlagDetail.description: Health recommendation detail text for adding Secure flag.

msgRecAddHttpOnly.description: Health recommendation title: add HttpOnly flag to exposed cookies.

msgRecAddHttpOnlyDetail.message: $COUNT$ cookies son accesibles por JavaScript y podrían ser robadas mediante XSS.
msgRecAddHttpOnlyDetail.description: Health recommendation detail text for adding HttpOnly flag.

msgRecSetSameSite.description: Health recommendation title: set SameSite policy on cookies.

msgRecSetSameSiteDetail.message: $COUNT$ cookies carecen de una política SameSite, aumentando el riesgo de CSRF.
msgRecSetSameSiteDetail.description: Health recommendation detail text for setting SameSite.

msgRecReduceLifespan.description: Health recommendation title: reduce lifespan of long-lived cookies.

msgRecReduceLifespanDetail.message: $COUNT$ cookies persisten más de 1 año. Duraciones más cortas reducen la exposición al rastreo.
msgRecReduceLifespanDetail.description: Health recommendation detail text for reducing cookie lifespan.

a11yEditCookie.description: Aria-label for cookie list items, announces the cookie name for screen readers.

a11yLoadProfile.description: Aria-label for profile cards, announces profile name and cookie count.

a11yEditRule.description: Aria-label for the edit button on a rule card.

a11yDeleteRule.description: Aria-label for the delete button on a rule card.

a11yToggleRule.description: Aria-label for the enable/disable toggle on a rule card.

a11ySearchCookies.description: Aria-label for the search input field.

a11yDismiss.description: Aria-label for the dismiss button on retention/growth banners.

a11yMainNavigation.description: Aria-label for the tab bar navigation element.

a11yCopyHeader.description: Aria-label for the copy button in the JWT header section.

a11yCopyPayload.description: Aria-label for the copy button in the JWT payload section.

a11yLicenseKey.description: Aria-label for the license key input in the paywall.

a11yCloseUpgradeDialog.description: Aria-label for the close button on the paywall modal.

a11yIncluded.description: Aria-label for checkmark icons in the paywall feature comparison table.

a11yNotIncluded.description: Aria-label for dash/cross icons in the paywall feature comparison table.

a11yDeleteProfile.description: Aria-label for the delete button on a profile card.

a11yLoadProfileBtn.description: Aria-label for the load button on a profile card.
